name: @fcai-sis/shared-utilities
description: All shared utility functions and structures

scripts.release:major: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && npm run publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm run publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm run publish
